solo.name: Arcane Wonder
solo.capacity: If this model is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers a POW 8 magical damage roll unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack
This model has no Normal Movement or Combat Action, cannot become knocked down or be moved, and is automatically hit by melee attacks
Enemy magic attacks targeting a friendly model within 4" of this model suffer -2 RNG.

This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. This model cannot engage or be engaged. Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.

solo.name: Armory
solo.capacity: This model has no Normal Movement or Combat Action, cannot become knocked down or be moved, and is automatically hit by melee attacks

This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. This model cannot engage or be engaged. Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.
This model does not suffer damage from non-magical ranged attacks that are POW 10 or less and does not suffer damage from non-magical melee attacks that are P+S 10 or less.
During your Control Phase, choose one friendly Faction model within 4" of this model. That model’s weapons gain Damage Type: Magical for one turn.

solo.name: Bunker
solo.capacity: When this model is hit by a ranged or magic attack, the attacker rolls one less damage die.
This model does not suffer blast damage. Friendly models B2B with it do not suffer blast damage.
This model has no Normal Movement or Combat Action, cannot become knocked down or be moved, and is automatically hit by melee attacks

This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. This model cannot engage or be engaged. Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.

solo.name: Effigy of Valor
solo.capacity: This model has no Normal Movement or Combat Action, cannot become knocked down or be moved, and is automatically hit by melee attacks

This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. This model cannot engage or be engaged. Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.
This model provides cover to friendly models as if it were an obstacle. This model loses Roadblock while it is incorporeal or knocked down.
After resolving continuous effects during your Maintenance Phase, friendly knocked down models within 4" of this model stand up.

solo.name: Fuel Cache
solo.capacity: This model has no Normal Movement or Combat Action, cannot become knocked down or be moved, and is automatically hit by melee attacks

If this model is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers the Fire continuous effect unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.

This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. This model cannot engage or be engaged. Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.
During your Control Phase, place a 4" AOE cloud effect in play. Its center point must be within 1" of this model. The AOE remains in play for one round

solo.name: Stockpile
solo.capacity: When this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, you can choose to have one friendly, non-incorporeal Faction warjack, warbeast, or monstrosity model within 4" of this model be directly hit instead. That model is directly hit and suffers all damage and effects
This model has no Normal Movement or Combat Action, cannot become knocked down or be moved, and is automatically hit by melee attacks

This model cannot be placed, cannot channel spells, and cannot be chosen as a Prey target. This model cannot be targeted or damaged until the second player’s second turn. This model cannot engage or be engaged. Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.
During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from friendly warjacks, warbeasts, and monstrosities B2B with this model.
